title: Masala Peanuts 🥜 || Chatpata Namkeen || Snack || Winter treat ❄️
content:
Snack recipe: Masala peanuts  Servings : 3  Duration : 10 mins Peanuts also known as ground nuts, there are many recipes with peanuts. Peanuts are healthy and rich in iron and calcium, some of the recipes with peanuts are Peanut burfi, chikki, Masala peanuts, peanuts Laddu, etc., Peanuts is a common ingredient available at everyone's home in India. It is best combination with any South Indian dish or peanut chutney perfect to any South Indian breakfast recipes. Nutrition facts: Peanuts: Vitamin B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, protein, potassium & fiber Today I prepared a snack recipe for winter treat, it's simple and quick to make they are succulent and crunchy bites. Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Dry roasted peanuts - 300 gms Red chilly powder - 1 tsp Chaat Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp Coriander powder - 1/2 tsp Cumin powder - 1 tsp Salt - 1/2 tsp Turmeric powder - pinch Sunflower oil - 1 tsp Procedure:
  • Take dry roasted peanuts in a bowl
  • Peel off them
  • Take a bowl of peeled off roasted peanuts
  • Add spices
  • Add oil
  • Mix well
  • Masala peanuts ready 😀
  • Serve at evening snack/ winter ❄️
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  •  Preserve upto 2 weeks
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • Double the ingredients to increase the quantity
